project.name: simon says
project.notes: FULL WINDOW MODE RECOMMENDED! Play Simon Says using your webcam. Do what you are instructed only if Simon says to. Requires speakers or headphones and a webcam. Runs best in Chrome. Please send questions, suggestions, and bug reports to toontalk@gmail.com

list.l: Do what Simon says but only what he says and before the time runs out.
Click the green flag to play again.

custom-block.comment: The number is how many seconds you have to respond.

custom-block.s: Open this in a new tab

custom-block.comment: Preload the model so the first round timer is OK.

block-definition.s: Simon says workhorse %'Simon said' %'stop time' %'body part 1' %'body part 2' %'instructions' %'seconds to reply'

custom-block.comment: Get a new pose and run this again. But nothing to say this time.

custom-block.s: touching body parts %l and %l in pose %l

custom-block.l: Correct! But Simon didn't say to do that!
You did right. Since Simon didn't say.

custom-block.comment: Get a new pose and run this again. But nothing to say this time.

block-definition.s: touching body parts %'body part 1' and %'body part 2' in pose %'pose'

block-definition.translations: pt:altera o valor da configuração _ para _

input.options: Presentation mode Retina display support Long form input dialog Plain prototype labels Input sliders Execute on slider change Clicking sound Turbo mode Flat design Keyboard editing Visible stepping Thread safe scripts Prefer smooth animations Flat line ends Codification support Inheritance support

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), ide = stage.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph), world = stage.parentThatIsA(WorldMorph), thisObj = this; if (tf != !!tf) return; try{ ide.savingPreferences = false; switch (which) { case 'Presentation mode': if (tf != ide.isAppMode) ide.toggleAppMode(); break; case 'Retina display support': if (tf != isRetinaEnabled()) ide.toggleRetina(); break; case 'Long form input dialog': if (tf != InputSlotDialogMorph.prototype.isLaunchingExpanded) ide.toggleLongFormInputDialog(); break; case 'Plain prototype labels': if (tf != BlockLabelPlaceHolderMorph.prototype.plainLabel) ide.togglePlainPrototypeLabels(); break; case 'Input sliders': MorphicPreferences.useSliderForInput = tf; break; case 'Execute on slider change': ArgMorph.prototype.executeOnSliderEdit = tf; break; case 'Clicking sound': if (tf != !!BlockMorph.prototype.snapSound) BlockMorph.prototype.toggleSnapSound(); break; case 'Turbo mode': if (tf != stage.isFastTracked) ide.toggleFastTracking(); break; case 'Flat design': if (tf == MorphicPreferences.isFlat) break; if (tf) ide.flatDesign(); else ide.defaultDesign(); break; case 'Keyboard editing': if (tf != (world.keyboardReceiver instanceof ScriptFocusMorph)) { thisObj.scripts.toggleKeyboardEntry(); }; break; case 'Visible stepping': if (tf != Process.prototype.enableSingleStepping) ide.toggleSingleStepping(); break; case 'Thread safe scripts': stage.isThreadSafe = tf; break; case 'Prefer smooth animations': if (tf != (StageMorph.prototype.frameRate > 0)) ide.toggleVariableFrameRate(); break; case 'Flat line ends': SpriteMorph.prototype.useFlatLineEnds = tf; break; case 'Codification support': if (tf != StageMorph.prototype.enableCodeMapping) { StageMorph.prototype.enableCodeMapping = tf; ide.currentSprite.blocksCache.variables = null; ide.currentSprite.paletteCache.variables = null; ide.refreshPalette(); } break; case 'Inheritance support': if (tf != StageMorph.prototype.enableInheritance) { StageMorph.prototype.enableInheritance = tf; ide.currentSprite.blocksCache.variables = null; ide.currentSprite.paletteCache.variables = null; ide.refreshPalette(); } break; }; } finally { ide.savingPreferences = false; };

block-definition.s: Open this in a new tab
Speak %'message' then %'to do when finished speaking'

block-definition.comment: Use the browser's default voice or Mary TTS to speak the 'message'.
Reports a costume using the camera.

custom-block.s: Create custoume from camera %b and pass it to %cmdRing

block-definition.s: Create custoume from camera %'mirrored' and pass it to %'process costume'
block-definition.comment: Creates a costume from the video camera and passes it the 'process costume' blocks.
Reports a list of poses. Use 'pose property' to get the locations of body parts and the confidences that the locations are correct.

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l

block-definition.s: segmentations and poses of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options' $nl process response %'process segmentations and poses' $nl and if there is an error %'process error'
segmentations and poses of costume %'costume' $nl with options %'options'

custom-block.s: segmentations and poses of costume %s %br with options %l %br process response %cmdRing %br and if there is an error %cmdRing

block-definition.comment: Reports the value of the 'key' in a table that is a list of pairs of keys and values.

block.l: if (typeof ecraft2learn === 'object') { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); } else { var script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.addEventListener('error', function () { alert("Unable to load https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js. Check your network connection."); }); script.src = "https://ecraft2learn.github.io/ai/ecraft2learn.js"; script.addEventListener('load', function () { ecraft2learn.run(function_name, parameters); }); document.head.appendChild(script); }

block-definition.comment: This reports either the location of a body part as two numbrs between 0 and 100 or the confidence that the body part is correctly identified as a number between 0 and 100.

input.options: confidence it is a person - 0 confidence there is a nose - 1 location of nose - 2 confidence there is a left eye - 3 location of left eye - 4 confidence there is a right eye - 5 location of right eye - 6 confidence there is a left ear - 7 location of left ear - 8 confidence there is a right ear - 9 location of right ear - 10 confidence there is a left shoulder - 11 location of leff shoulder - 12 confidence there is a right shoulder - 13 location of right shoulder - 14 confidence there is a left elbow - 15 location of left elbow - 16 confidence there is a right elbow - 17 location of right elbow - 18 confidence there is a left wrist - 19 location of left wrist - 20 confidence there is a right wrist - 21 location of right wrist - 22 confidence there is a left hip - 23 location of left hip - 24 confidence there is a right hip - 25 location of right hip - 26 confidence there is a left knee - 27 location of left knee - 28 confidence there is a right knee - 29 location of right knee - 30 confidence there is a left ankle - 31 location of left ankle - 32 confidence there is a right ankle - 33 location of right ankle - 34

block.comment: 'property name' ends with hypen and a number and this extracts that number. Add 0 to ensure it is a number and not text.

block-definition.s: pose property %'location or confidence' of %'left or right' %'body part' from %'pose'
block-definition.comment: This reports either the location of a body part as two numbrs between 0 and 100 or the confidence that the body part is correctly identified as a number between 0 and 100.

input.options: eye ear shoulder elbow wrist hip knee ankle nose person

block.comment: Only the nose has no left or right versions.
Property numbers range from 0 to 34 to identify different information in a pose.
Confidence that there is a person at all.
Location extracted from [["x" 1] ["y" 2]]. Coordinates adjusted to go from 0 to 100.

block-definition.s: pose property %'location or confidence' of %'left or right' %'body part' from %'pose' using stage coordinates %'stage coordinates'
block-definition.comment: This reports either the confidence that the body part is correctly identified as a number between 0 and 100 or the location of a body part as two numbers. If 'stage coordinates' is true then the location matches the stage coordinates, otherwise it is between 0 and 100.

input.options: eye ear shoulder elbow wrist hip knee ankle nose person

custom-block.s: pose property %txt of %l using stage coordinates %b
pose property %txt of %l using stage coordinates %b
pose property %txt of %l using stage coordinates %b

block.comment: Only the nose has no left or right versions.
Property numbers range from 0 to 34 to identify different information in a pose.

custom-block.s: extract pose property %n from %l using stage coordinates %b

block-definition.s: extract pose property %'property number' from %'pose' using stage coordinates %'stage coordinates'

block.comment: Confidence that there is a person at all.
Coordinates adjusted to go from 0 to 100.

block.l: return [ "confidence it is a person", "confidence there is a nose", "location of nose", "confidence there is a left eye", "location of left eye", "confidence there is a right eye", "location of right eye", "confidence there is a left ear", "location of left ear", "confidence there is a right ear", "location of right ear", "confidence there is a left shoulder", "location of left shoulder", "confidence there is a right shoulder", "location of right shoulder", "confidence there is a left elbow", "location of left elbow", "confidence there is a right elbow", "location of right elbow", "confidence there is a left wrist", "location of left wrist", "confidence there is a right wrist", "location of right wrist", "confidence there is a left hip", "location of left hip", "confidence there is a right hip", "location of right hip", "confidence there is a left knee", "location of left knee", "confidence there is a right knee", "location of right knee", "confidence there is a left ankle", "location of left ankle", "confidence there is a right ankle", "location of right ankle" ].indexOf(property_name)

block-definition.s: pose property %'property name' of %'pose' using stage coordinates %'stage coordinates'
block-definition.comment: This reports either the confidence that the body part is correctly identified as a number between 0 and 100 or the location of a body part as two numbers. If 'stage coordinates' is true then the location matches the stage coordinates, otherwise it is between 0 and 100.

input.options: confidence it is a person confidence there is a nose location of nose confidence there is a left eye location of left eye confidence there is a right eye location of right eye confidence there is a left ear location of left ear confidence there is a right ear location of right ear confidence there is a left shoulder location of left shoulder confidence there is a right shoulder location of right shoulder confidence there is a left elbow location of left elbow confidence there is a right elbow location of right elbow confidence there is a left wrist location of left wrist confidence there is a right wrist location of right wrist confidence there is a left hip location of left hip confidence there is a right hip location of right hip confidence there is a left knee location of left knee confidence there is a right knee location of right knee confidence there is a left ankle location of left ankle confidence there is a right ankle location of right ankle

custom-block.s: extract pose property %n from %l using stage coordinates %b
